channel.title: Osx on Bits and pieces to remember

item.title: Puppet and OSX Mismatch
item.author: roman.heinrich@gmail.com
item.description: Modules, that show some attempts to bring puppet and OSX together: https://github.com/bry4n/puppet-osx/tree/master/modules https://github.com/pneff/puppet-darwin http://projects.puppetlabs.com/projects/1/wiki/Package_Management_With_Dmg_Patterns
